alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:05PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Willow Creek near Crooks affecting Minnehaha County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Willow Creek near Crooks. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the lower left banks overflow flooding some pasture and hay land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Willow Creek Crooks 9.0 9.4 Tue 8 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 1115 PM CDT.
